description: Mobile techniques used by Desert Scorpion, ATT&CK software S0505 (v1.2)
name: Desert Scorpion (S0505)

techniques.comment: [Desert Scorpion](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0505) can encrypt exfiltrated data.(Citation: Lookout Desert Scorpion)
[Desert Scorpion](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0505) can record audio from phone calls and the device microphone.(Citation: Lookout Desert Scorpion)
[Desert Scorpion](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0505) can collect attacker-specified files, including files located on external storage.(Citation: Lookout Desert Scorpion)
[Desert Scorpion](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0505) has been distributed in multiple stages.(Citation: Lookout Desert Scorpion)
[Desert Scorpion](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0505) can list files stored on external storage.(Citation: Lookout Desert Scorpion)
[Desert Scorpion](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0505) can hide its icon.(Citation: Lookout Desert Scorpion)
[Desert Scorpion](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0505) can delete copies of itself if additional APKs are downloaded to external storage.(Citation: Lookout Desert Scorpion)
[Desert Scorpion](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0505) can track the device’s location.(Citation: Lookout Desert Scorpion)
[Desert Scorpion](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0505) can be controlled using SMS messages.(Citation: Lookout Desert Scorpion)
[Desert Scorpion](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0505) can collect the device’s contact list.(Citation: Lookout Desert Scorpion)
[Desert Scorpion](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0505) can retrieve SMS messages.(Citation: Lookout Desert Scorpion)
[Desert Scorpion](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0505) can send SMS messages.(Citation: Lookout Desert Scorpion)
[Desert Scorpion](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0505) can obtain a list of installed applications.(Citation: Lookout Desert Scorpion)
[Desert Scorpion](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0505) can collect account information stored on the device.(Citation: Lookout Desert Scorpion)

If running on a Huawei device, [Desert Scorpion](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0505) adds itself to the protected apps list, which allows it to run with the screen off.(Citation: Lookout Desert Scorpion)
[Desert Scorpion](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0505) can collect device metadata and can check if the device is rooted.(Citation: Lookout Desert Scorpion)
[Desert Scorpion](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0505) can record videos.(Citation: Lookout Desert Scorpion)
